   20: -module(bif_no_opt_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("syntax_tools/include/merl.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -export([all/0,suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1,end_per_suite/1,
   25: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   26:          unsafe_get_list/1,
   27: 	 beam_validator/1,trunc_and_friends/1,cover_safe_and_pure_bifs/1,
   28:          cover_trim/1,
   29:          head_tail/1,
   30:          min_max/1]).
   31: 
   32: suite() ->
   33:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   34: 
   35: all() ->
   36:     [{group,p}].
   37: 
   38: groups() ->
   39:     [{p,test_lib:parallel(),
   40:       [beam_validator,
   41:        unsafe_get_list,
   42:        trunc_and_friends,
   43:        cover_safe_and_pure_bifs,
   44:        cover_trim,
   45:        head_tail,
   46:        min_max
   47:       ]}].
   48: 
   49: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   50:     _ = id(Config),
   51:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   52:     Config.
   53: 
   54: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   55:     ok.
   56: 
   57: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   58:     Config.
   59: 
   60: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   61:     Config.
   62: 
   63: unsafe_get_list(_Config) ->
   64:     [[1], [1], [1]] = create_rows(id(3)),
   65:     ok.
   66: 
   67: create_rows(Num) -> create_rows(Num, [[1]]).
   68: 
   69: create_rows(1, Rows) ->
   70:     Rows;
   71: create_rows(Num, [PrevRow | _] = Rows) ->
   72:     [_PrevRowH | PrevRowT] = PrevRow,
   73:     [] = first(PrevRowT, PrevRow),
   74:     create_rows(Num - 1, [[1] | Rows]).
   75: 
   76: first(Fst, _Snd) -> Fst.
   77: 
   78: %% Cover code in beam_validator.
   79: 
   80: beam_validator(Config) ->
   81:     [false,Config] = food(Config),
   82: 
   83:     true = is_number(42.0),
   84:     false = is_port(Config),
   85: 
   86:     ok.
   87: 
   88: food(Curriculum) ->
   89:     [try
   90: 	 is_bitstring(functions)
   91:      catch _ ->
   92: 	     0
   93:      end, Curriculum].
   94: 
   95: %% Test trunc/1, round/1, floor/1, ceil/1.
   96: trunc_and_friends(_Config) ->
   97:     Bifs = [trunc,round,floor,ceil],
   98:     Fs = trunc_and_friends_1(Bifs),
   99:     Mod = ?FUNCTION_NAME,
  100:     Calls = [begin
  101: 		 Atom = erl_syntax:function_name(N),
  102: 		 ?Q("'@Atom'()")
  103: 	     end || N <- Fs],
  104:     Tree = ?Q(["-module('@Mod@').",
  105: 	       "-export([test/0]).",
  106: 	       "test() -> _@Calls, ok.",
  107: 	       "id(I) -> I."]) ++ Fs,
  108:     merl:print(Tree),
  109:     Opts = test_lib:opt_opts(?MODULE),
  110:     {ok,_Bin} = merl:compile_and_load(Tree, Opts),
  111:     Mod:test(),
  112:     ok.
  113: 
  114: trunc_and_friends_1([F|Fs]) ->
  115:     Func = list_to_atom("f"++integer_to_list(length(Fs))),
  116:     [trunc_template(Func, F)|trunc_and_friends_1(Fs)];
  117: trunc_and_friends_1([]) -> [].
  118: 
  119: trunc_template(Func, Bif) ->
  120:     Val = 42.77,
  121:     Res = erlang:Bif(Val),
  122:     FloatRes = float(Res),
  123:     ?Q("'@Func@'() ->
  124:         Var = id(_@Val@),
  125:         if _@Bif@(Var) =:= _@Res@ -> ok end,
  126: 	if _@Bif@(Var) == _@FloatRes@ -> ok end,
  127: 	if _@Bif@(Var) == _@Res@ -> ok end,
  128:         _@Res@ = _@Bif@(Var),
  129:         try begin _@Bif@(a), ok end
  130:         catch error:badarg -> ok end,
  131:         ok.").
  132: 
  133: cover_safe_and_pure_bifs(Config) ->
  134:     _ = get(),
  135:     _ = get_keys(a),
  136:     _ = group_leader(),
  137:     _ = is_alive(),
  138:     _ = min(Config, []),
  139:     _ = nodes(),
  140:     _ = erlang:ports(),
  141:     _ = pre_loaded(),
  142:     _ = processes(),
  143:     _ = registered(),
  144:     _ = term_to_binary(Config),
  145:     42 = list_to_integer("2A", 16),
  146:     a = binary_to_atom(atom_to_binary(a)),
  147: 
  148:     ok.
  149: 
  150: cover_trim(_Config) ->
  151:     ok = cover_trim_1(<<"abc">>, id([42])),
  152:     ok = cover_trim_1({a,b,c}, id([42])),
  153: 
  154:     true = cover_trim_2("keep-alive", "1"),
  155:     false = cover_trim_2("keep-alive", "0"),
  156:     false = cover_trim_2("other", "1"),
  157:     false = cover_trim_2("other", "0"),
  158: 
  159:     true = cover_trim_3("keep-alive", -1),
  160:     false = cover_trim_3("keep-alive", 100),
  161:     false = cover_trim_3("other", -10),
  162:     false = cover_trim_3("other", -100),
  163: 
  164:     ok.
  165: 
  166: cover_trim_1(Something, V) ->
  167:     id(Something),
  168:     id(Something),
  169:     if
  170:         hd(V) =:= 42 ->
  171:             ok
  172:     end.
  173: 
  174: cover_trim_2(Header, NList)->
  175:     id(0),
  176:     case id(Header) of
  177:         "keep-alive" when hd(NList) >= $1 ->
  178:             true;
  179:         _Connect ->
  180:             false
  181:     end.
  182: 
  183: cover_trim_3(Header, N)->
  184:     id(0),
  185:     case id(Header) of
  186:         "keep-alive" when abs(N) < 42 ->
  187:             true;
  188:         _Connect ->
  189:             false
  190:     end.
  191: 
  192: %% GH-7024: The loader transformations for hd/1 and tl/1 were incorrect and
  193: %% failed when certain optimizations were turned off.
  194: head_tail(_Config) ->
  195:     {1, ok} = head_case(),
  196:     {1, ok} = tail_case(),
  197: 
  198:     1 = hd(id([1])),
  199:     [] = tl(id([1])),
  200: 
  201:     ok.
  202: 
  203: head_case() ->
  204:     case 1 of
  205:         X when hd(X) -> blurf;
  206:         X -> {X, ok}
  207:     end.
  208: 
  209: tail_case() ->
  210:     case 1 of
  211:         X when tl(X) -> blurf;
  212:         X -> {X, ok}
  213:     end.
  214: 
  215: min_max(_Config) ->
  216:     False = id(false),
  217:     True = id(true),
  218: 
  219:     false = bool_min_false(False, False),
  220:     false = bool_min_false(False, True),
  221:     false = bool_min_false(True, False),
  222:     true = bool_min_true(True, True),
  223: 
  224:     false = bool_max_false(False, False),
  225:     true = bool_max_true(False, True),
  226:     true = bool_max_true(True, False),
  227:     true = bool_max_true(True, True),
  228: 
  229:     11 = min_increment(100),
  230:     11 = min_increment(10),
  231:     10 = min_increment(9),
  232:     1 = min_increment(0),
  233:     0 = min_increment(-1),
  234:     11 = min_increment(a),
  235: 
  236:     {42,42} = max_number(id(42)),
  237:     {42,42.0} = max_number(id(42.0)),
  238:     {-1,1} = max_number(id(-1)),
  239:     {-1,1} = max_number(id(-1.0)),
  240: 
  241:     100 = int_clamped_add(-1),
  242:     100 = int_clamped_add(0),
  243:     105 = int_clamped_add(5),
  244:     110 = int_clamped_add(10),
  245:     110 = int_clamped_add(11),
  246: 
  247:     100 = num_clamped_add(-1),
  248:     100 = num_clamped_add(0),
  249:     105 = num_clamped_add(5),
  250:     110 = num_clamped_add(10),
  251:     110 = num_clamped_add(11),
  252: 
  253:     105 = num_clamped_add(5),
  254:     105.0 = num_clamped_add(5.0),
  255:     110 = num_clamped_add(a),
  256:     110 = num_clamped_add({a,b,c}),
  257:     110 = num_clamped_add({a,b,c}),
  258: 
  259:     ok.
  260: 
  261: %% GH-7170: The following functions would cause a crash in
  262: %% beam_ssa_codegen.
  263: 
  264: bool_min_false(A, B) when is_boolean(A), is_boolean(B) ->
  265:     false = min(A, B).
  266: 
  267: bool_min_true(A, B) when is_boolean(A), is_boolean(B) ->
  268:     true = min(A, B).
  269: 
  270: bool_max_false(A, B) when is_boolean(A), is_boolean(B) ->
  271:     false = max(A, B).
  272: 
  273: bool_max_true(A, B) when is_boolean(B) ->
  274:     true = max(A, B),
  275:     if
  276:         is_boolean(A) ->
  277:             true = max(A, B)
  278:     end.
  279: 
  280: max_number(A) ->
  281:     Res = {trunc(A), max(A, 1)},
  282:     Res = {trunc(A), max(1, A)}.
  283: 
  284: min_increment(A) ->
  285:     Res = min(10, A) + 1,
  286:     Res = min(A, 10) + 1,
  287:     Res = min(id(A), 10) + 1.
  288: 
  289: int_clamped_add(A) when is_integer(A) ->
  290:     min(max(A, 0), 10) + 100.
  291: 
  292: num_clamped_add(A) ->
  293:     min(max(A, 0), 10) + 100.
  294: 
  295: %%%
  296: %%% Common utilities.
  297: %%%
  298: 
  299: id(I) ->
  300:     I.
